original_title: Scenic National Parks: Mt. Rushmore & The Black Hills
overview: Mount Rushmore stands unrivaled in the world, a sky-high tribute to the heroes and ideals that shaped America. This stirring program features rare footage that chronicles its monumental construction. This iconic treasure is just one of the wonders to be found in the Black Hills, a region rich in history and majesty.
title: Scenic National Parks: Mt. Rushmore & The Black Hills
